Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, Gui
public interface View
Defines a generic view to be implemented by each view type There are two types of players: the main player, the first to connect to the game, which defines the games settings, and the normal player who defines only his customization

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    askNickname()
    After socket connection the user is asked to chose his username to complete the in game registration.
    void
    askPlayCustomization()
    Client shows this to all users to set customizations.
    void
    askPlaySettings()
    When a client Finds out to be a main player client, will show to the user this screen "asking to set the game".
    void
    setStatePrinter(PlayMessageController playMessageController)
    The view to update herself relies on a PlayState class given by the playMessageController, which stores the actual known to the client state of the game.
    void
    showAvailableWizards()
    Shows which wizards are available to be chosen

    update()

  • Method Details

    • setStatePrinter

      void setStatePrinter(PlayMessageController playMessageController)
      The view to update herself relies on a PlayState class given by the playMessageController, which stores the actual known to the client state of the game.
      Parameters:
      playMessageController -

    • askNickname

      void askNickname()
      After socket connection the user is asked to chose his username to complete the in game registration.

    • askPlaySettings

      void askPlaySettings()
      When a client Finds out to be a main player client, will show to the user this screen "asking to set the game". That is to say ask the number of players and the mode

    • askPlayCustomization

      void askPlayCustomization()
      Client shows this to all users to set customizations.

    • showMainPlayerName

      void showMainPlayerName(String mainPlayerName)
      Used to show the main player to the user
      Parameters:
      mainPlayerName - name of the main player

    • showLoginResult

      void showLoginResult(boolean connectionCompleted, boolean connectionStarted, String nickname)
      Used to show the result of the login to the player, shown after asking gor the username
      Parameters:
      connectionCompleted - if the nickname has been completely established
      connectionStarted - true if connection has been successfully started
      nickname - accepted nickname

    • showGenericMessage

      void showGenericMessage(String genericMessage)
      One kind of messages that can be sent by the server are of the GENERIC type
      Parameters:
      genericMessage - message's content

    • showDisconnectionMessage

      void showDisconnectionMessage(String nicknameDisconnected, String text)
      Shows to the user if the client has been disconnected from the server
      Parameters:
      nicknameDisconnected - name disconnected
      text - message of the disconnection

    • showOtherDisconnectionMessage

      void showOtherDisconnectionMessage(String nicknameDisconnected, String text)
      Shows the disconnection of another player
      Parameters:
      nicknameDisconnected - nickname who disconnected
      text - message of the disconnection

    • showErrorAndExit

      void showErrorAndExit(String error)
      Error and exit
      Parameters:
      error - error

    • showLobby

      void showLobby(List<String> nicknameList, int numPlayers)
      Called every time a player joins
      Parameters:
      nicknameList - list of players
      numPlayers - max number of players who should be connected

    • showError

      void showError(String errorMessage)
      Shows the content of the error message sent by the server
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - content of the ERROR message

    • showWizard

      void showWizard()
      Shows if the player's preference on the wizard's choice was accepted or discarded

    • showAvailableWizards

      void showAvailableWizards()
      Shows which wizards are available to be chosen

    • showChosenNumOfPlayers

      void showChosenNumOfPlayers(int maxPlayers)
      Shows to the user how many players will this game gave, as for what the main player has chosen
      Parameters:
      maxPlayers - max number of players

    • showExpert

      void showExpert(boolean expertStatus)
      Shows if the play is in the expert variant or in the normal one
      Parameters:
      expertStatus - true if the play is in expert variant, false else

    • showEndGame

      void showEndGame(String winnerName)
      Shows the content of the end game play message received from the server

    • update

      void update()
      After having changed the game status in the Play message class, this method is called to print the actual state of the game
